title: Qld man shot dead in home invasion
text:
A man has been shot dead and a second man attacked with a hammer during a home invasion south of Brisbane just before 6am on Monday.

Police said the 48-year-old was shot in the leg and died at the Gleneagle home near Beaudesert while a second man, 40, is in a stable condition after being hit on the head with a hammer.

Police are hunting a black, new model, Holden Commodore utility with no registration plates that was seen leaving the address and last seen travelling on the Mount Lindesay Highway.
